author: Saabira Chaudhuri
title: Elliott Management Buys British Bookstore Chain Waterstones
text:
Elliott Management Corp. has acquired Britainâ€™s biggest bookstore chain, Waterstones, the latest deal by the storied activist hedge fund as it builds up its private equity business.
The acquisition is a bet on the staying power of brick and mortar retail at a time when many retailers across the developed world are shuttering stores. Waterstones has surfaced from a period of losses and continues to open new stores, defying the trend of other booksellers and retails stores, which have been shrinking under the pressure of Amazon.com...
